attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A) Play one Michael Jackson song in the house of commons 5 minutes before the session starts for one week.

B) Make the speaker attempt to do a moon walk dance at least once a day at a time suitable for him.

C) Make those in the expenses row participate in a Pepsi commercial (those members without hair must wear a wig).

D) Make the Prime Minister perform in the O2 for 50 nights in a row in order to stimulate the economy (let's face it, he'll do a far better job in there than in the house of commons).

Maybe only then the house of Commons might end up relating to its people.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
